text: Paju () is a city in Gyeonggi Province, South Korea. Paju was made a city in 1997.Welcome to Paju City The city area of Paju is ,"Paju (Gyeonggi-do Province)." Naver Encyclopedia of Knowledge. Naver, 2015. 4 Mar. 2016. and it is located just south of Panmunjeom on the 38th parallel. ==References== Category:Cities in South Korea
